title: What are the etiology pathogenesis symptoms and treatment of sickle cell and iron deficiency anaemia? - Quora

response.answer_text: Iron deficiency anemia is caused by deficiency of iron in blood due to poor intake, absorption or blood loss and many other reasons Sickle cell anemia is genetic disease cause destruction of red blood cells due to change in their shape, It has no treatment except if haemoglobin goes below 8, blood transfusion may be given
